      • block

        public boolean block

      • noButton

        public boolean noButton

      • drawText

        public boolean drawText

      • hideOnClickOutside

        public boolean hideOnClickOutside

      • hasNoTargetView

        public boolean hasNoTargetView

      • insert

        @Deprecated
public int insert
        Deprecated. not compatible with Target API
        Does not work with the ShowcaseViews class as it does not make sense (only with ShowcaseView).

      • showcaseId

        public int showcaseId
        If you want to use more than one Showcase with the shotType ShowcaseView.TYPE_ONE_SHOT in one Activity, set a unique value for every different Showcase you want to use.

      • shotType

        public int shotType
        If you want to use more than one Showcase with ShowcaseView.TYPE_ONE_SHOT in one Activity, set a unique showcaseId value for every different Showcase you want to use. If you want to use this in the ShowcaseViews class, you need to set a custom showcaseId for each ShowcaseView.

      • fadeInDuration

        public int fadeInDuration
        Default duration for fade in animation. Set to 0 to disable.

      • fadeOutDuration

        public int fadeOutDuration
        Default duration for fade out animation. Set to 0 to disable.

      • buttonLayoutParams

        public android.widget.RelativeLayout.LayoutParams buttonLayoutParams
        Allow custom positioning of the button within the showcase view.

      • centerText

        public boolean centerText
        Whether the text should be centered or stretched in the available space

      • useRectCling

        public boolean useRectCling
        all custom cling to rect

      • imageDrawables

        public java.util.List<android.graphics.drawable.Drawable> imageDrawables
        draw images
